attributes.description:
BB Motor Group is a well-established franchise with a wide variety of new & pre-owned vehicles, service departments & parts. As part of a 60-year legacy, we strive to exceed the expectations of all potential & existing customers.

To establish & ensure peace of mind, trust and long lasting relationships with our clients, a detailed workshop quality inspection is done on each of our pre-loved vehicles, along with a roadworthy test, full valet & body polish. Our excellent sales manager, Werner Delport, works closely with his team to ensure competitive offers & excellent service is produced.

Request a call back & one of our professionals will contact you.

We welcome all trade-ins & deliver nation-wide on request.

#BBWelkom #ExceedingAllExpectations
